text:
@ochealth 5g breaks down your immune system, thus making you more succepable to sickness. The coronavirus is a common cold, but bombard the body with 5g, killing off it's immune response, and covid19 can be deadly. Seniors are most at risk. 

OC needs to shut off 5G!
